title: Do(n't) Buy the Pixel 6a
description: The Google Pixel 6a is really, totally okay. Check out the @Denki video!  Subscribe!  Twitter:  Matt:  Instagram:   Chapter Titles ------------------------------- 0:00 We got a new set! 0:18 Pixel 6a Rundown 1:24 The older camera Isnt as bad as you think. 2:09 Find out more at youtube.com/denki 3:13 Pixel 6 VS 6a 4:06 Expect the price to drop soon.. 5:24 I think this is the best looking phone.. 6:25 I dont care about specs.. 7:50 Does the camera have software issues? 9:00 My big worry with the Pixel.. 10:07 This will NEVER sell.. 11:10 What do you think?
